title: Online Shop — Mall Store
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform designed for a shopping mall, featuring secure payment processing, inventory tracking, order management, and customer dashboards.

title: Clothing Shop — E-Commerce Clothes Store
description: An interactive clothing store with product filtering, size & color selection, secure checkout, and efficient backend order management.

title: Pato Restaurant — Reservation & Events
description: A modern restaurant platform with table reservations, event management, menu previews, and an admin dashboard for restaurant operations.

title: Course Academy — Online Course Booking
description: An educational platform for browsing, booking, and managing courses with student profiles, payments, schedules, and admin reports.

title: Farm Management & Finance System
description: A full-featured platform for agricultural management: crop tracking, employee attendance, daily activities, fertilizers, finances, and automated decision-support reporting.
